message.raw:
Omitted the truncate decorator in favour of changing every ramp method.
Now the duration is modified before add_instruction is executed.
This is more maintainable in the long run, as it is immune to changes to Output.
It also avoids the ramp collision detection problem.
Minor changes to exp_ramp and exp_ramp_t to conform with kwarg name(s) and error
checking.
